item.name: Auth
item.description: Roles: artisan, client, admin. Register and login return { token, user } (user has id, name, email, role; no password).

exec: if(json && (json.token || json.accessToken)){ var t = json.token || json.accessToken; pm.environment.set('authToken', t); pm.test('Saved authToken', function(){pm.expect(pm.environment.get('authToken')).to.be.a('string');}); }

item.name: Orders

query.description: Filter by status: pending, assigned, in_progress, completed, delayed
